alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 22 at 8:17PM EST until December 23 at 9:25AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Lumber River 1 SE Nichols affecting Dillon, Horry and Marion Counties. Little Pee Dee River At Galivants Ferry affecting Horry and Marion Counties. For the Little Pee Dee River...including Galivants Ferry...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Lumber River 1 se Nichols. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor flooding along River Road east of Nichols on the Horry County side of the river begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 18.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Saturday morning.
